SVGImageElementDecode.summary:
The decode() method of the
interface initiates asynchronous decoding of an image,
returning a that resolves once the image is decoded and it is safe to append
it to the DOM.

remarks.para:
-: The same thing, but for HTML <img> elements
-What does the image decoding attribute actually do? on tunetheweb.com (2023)

SVGImageElementDecode.returns: A that fulfills with undefined once the image data is ready to be used, for example by appending it to the DOM, replacing an existing image, and so forth.
